room1.message: You hear nothing. Your options are to move north or east.

room2.message: You hear nothing. Your options are to move north or west.

room3.message: You hear nothing. Your options are to move north or east.

room4.message: You hear nothing. Your options are to move north or west.

room5.message: You hear nothing. Your options are to move north or south.

room6.message: You hear nothing. Your options are to move east or south.

room7.message: You hear nothing. Your options are to move north, south, or west.

room8.message: You hear nothing. Your options are to move south. You found a fireball scroll!

room9.message: You hear nothing. Your options are to move east or south.

room10.message: You hear a roar off in the distance. Your options are to move north or west.

room11.message: You hear nothing. Your options are to move east or south.

room12.message: You hear a roar off in the distance. Your options are to move north or west.

room13.message: You hear a roar off in the distance. Your options are to move east. You found a fireball scroll!

room14.message: You hear a loud roar! Your options are to move south, east or west.

room15.message: You found the monster (and died)! GAME OVER!

room16.message: You hear a loud roar! Your options are to move west or south.
